core.trade

Class TradeThresholdManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.trade.TradeThresholdManager

  • public class TradeThresholdManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages the trade thresholds and related queries.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TradeThresholdManager(int maxIncompleteTrades, int maxWeeklyTransactions, int minLendBorrowDifference)
      Constructs an instance of AdminTradeManager.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TradeThresholdManager

        public TradeThresholdManager(int maxIncompleteTrades,
                             int maxWeeklyTransactions,
                             int minLendBorrowDifference)
        Constructs an instance of AdminTradeManager.
        Parameters:
        maxIncompleteTrades - the max num of incomplete trades a user can have.
        maxWeeklyTransactions - the max num of transactions a user can have per week.
        minLendBorrowDifference - the max number the user can borrow more than lend.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserOverMaxIncompleteTrade

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getUserOverMaxIncompleteTrade(UserAccountManager ua,
                                                                                       TradeInfoManager tradeManager)
        Gets all number of incomplete Trade of Users which over maxIncompleteTrade.
        Parameters:
        ua - a UserAccountManager for accessing user information.
        tradeManager - a TradeManager for get trades related to users
        Returns:
        a Map of username and their number of incomplete Trade over maxIncompleteTrade which key is username, value is number of incomplete Trade.

      • getUsersNotUpToMinLentBorrowDifference

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getUsersNotUpToMinLentBorrowDifference(UserAccountManager ua)
        Gets a map of usernames of users that exceeded minLendBorrowDifference. minLendBorrowDifference is the difference between number of items lend and items borrowed, with items lend being the larger one.
        Parameters:
        ua - a UserAccountManager for accessing user information.
        Returns:
        a map that maps username of users to pair of number of lending and borrowing of the user.

      • getUserOverWeeklyTransMaxMap

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getUserOverWeeklyTransMaxMap(java.util.List<Trade> trades)
        Gets all number of completed Trade of Users which over maxWeeklyTransaction.
        Parameters:
        trades - a collection of all trades that will be checked
        Returns:
        a Map of username and their number of completed Trade over maxWeeklyTransaction which key is username, value is number of completed trade.

      • getThreshold

        public int getThreshold(TradeThresholdType type)
        Gets the trade related threshold of type.

        Precondition: type must be either MAX_INCOMPLETE_TRADES, MAX_WEEKLY_TRANSACTIONS or MIN_LEND_BORROW_DIFF.

        Parameters:
        type - the type of threshold to be shown.
        Returns:
        the value of the threshold type.

      • setThreshold

        public void setThreshold(TradeThresholdType type,
                         int value)
        Sets the trade related threshold of type to value.

        Precondition: type must be either MAX_INCOMPLETE_TRADES, MAX_WEEKLY_TRANSACTIONS or MIN_LEND_BORROW_DIFF.

        Parameters:
        type - the type of threshold to be set.
        value - the new value of type to be set.
